articles.description: Tech giant Dell offers significant New Year discounts on tech products, including the XPS 15 and Latitude 3540 laptops, and Alienware gaming devices. Explore the deals on Dell's website or check out CNET's roundup of the best laptop deals.
articles.content: In a bid to kick-start the New Year with a bang, tech giant Dell is hosting a sensational sales event, offering considerable markdowns on a wide array of tech products. From laptops and desktops to m… [+1768 chars]
